title: Comment from Patricia De La Cuadra

analysis.key_quote: The proposed changes risk violating several constitutional rights of federal employees, including: Fifth Amendment – Due Process Clause: Employees could be deprived of their property (employment) without the required due process, undermining their rights to a fair and transparent process.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting serious risks to employee rights, job security, and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with concerns about undermining the merit-based system.
